name: Nekocms-v2
body:
### What is Neko! CMS?

Neko! CMS a very simple Content Management System built using PHP and MySQL and Twitter Bootstrap as CSS Framework. With Neko! CMS you can add dynamically pages , posts and even customize your page : changing the name of your webpage,adding social media account like facebook,twitter so that your viewers can follow you or add in social media,add photo in your Neko!CMS profile.

### Features of Neko! CMS

•	SEO friendly urls
•	Share your post in social media like Facebook,Twitter and Google +
•	Easy to install . no need programming knowledge. Even you’re a newbie or not you can easily set up your own blog
•	Responsive design.can fit in different devices such tablets,smartphones,phablet (Thanks to bootstrap!)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
